mapper.sql: SELECT CGU_ID, CGU_YEAR, CGU_SEMESTER, CGU_START_DATE, CGU_FINISH_DATE, CGU_STATE, CREDIT_ID FROM CREDIT_GIVE_UP
mapper.insert:
SELECT CGU_ID_SEQ.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO CREDIT_GIVE_UP VALUES(#{CGUId}, #{CGUYear}, #{CGUSemester}, TO_DATE(#{CGUStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{CGUFinishDate}, #{CGUState}, #{creditId})
mapper.update: UPDATE CREDIT_GIVE_UP SET CGU_YEAR=#{CGUYear}, CGU_SEMESTER=#{CGUSemester}, CGU_START_DATE=#{CGUStartDate}, CGU_FINISH_DATE= (SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) FROM DUAL), CGU_STATE=#{CGUState}, CREDIT_ID=#{creditId} WHERE CGU_ID=#{CGUId}
mapper.select: select cg.CGU_ID, cg.CGU_YEAR, cg.CGU_SEMESTER, cg.CGU_START_DATE, cg.CGU_FINISH_DATE, cg.CGU_STATE, cg.CREDIT_ID, c.credit_id, c.credit_year, c.credit_semester, c.credit_acquire, c.credit_grade, c.credit_score, c.credit_recource, c.subject_id, c.stu_id, s.subject_id, s.subject_name, s.subject_time, s.subject_type, s.subject_credit, s.subject_capacity, s.subject_request, s.subject_grade, s.subject_class, s.subject_close_class, s.subject_semester, s.major_id, s.lecture_id from CREDIT_GIVE_UP cg, credit c, subject s where cg.CREDIT_ID = c.credit_id and c.subject_id = s.subject_id and c.stu_id = #{value}

select cg.CGU_ID, cg.CGU_YEAR, cg.CGU_SEMESTER, cg.CGU_START_DATE, cg.CGU_FINISH_DATE, cg.CGU_STATE, cg.CREDIT_ID, c.credit_id, c.credit_year, c.credit_semester, c.credit_acquire, c.credit_grade, c.credit_score, c.credit_recource, c.subject_id, c.stu_id, s.subject_id, s.subject_name, s.subject_time, s.subject_type, s.subject_credit, s.subject_capacity, s.subject_request, s.subject_grade, s.subject_class, s.subject_close_class, s.subject_semester, s.major_id, s.lecture_id from CREDIT_GIVE_UP cg, credit c, subject s where cg.CREDIT_ID = c.credit_id and c.subject_id = s.subject_id and c.stu_id = #{stuId} and cg.CGU_YEAR=#{nowYear} and cg.CGU_SEMESTER=#{semester}

SELECT c.cgu_id, c.cgu_year, c.cgu_semester, c.cgu_start_date, c.cgu_finish_date, c.cgu_state, c.credit_id, m.major_name, u.users_id, u.users_name, su.subject_name FROM credit_give_up c, credit t, student s, users u, major m, subject su WHERE c.credit_id = t.credit_id AND t.stu_id = s.stu_id AND s.stu_id = u.users_id AND s.major_id = m.major_id AND t.subject_id = su.subject_id AND c.cgu_state = '대기'
